description:

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Stephen King has written so many iconic novels, screenplays, and other works that it’s difficult to imagine that he himself can be scared. In fact, Stephen King just confirmed what movie “truly scared” him last out of those he’s seen recently. Interestingly, the film that King mentions is one of the biggest horror movies of [...]

title: Stephen King Reveals What Movie “Truly Scared” Him Last
